titleInfo.title: ‘Plan of the Anchorage off the Town of El Katiff on the Arabian Side of the Persian Gulf by Lieutenants G.B. Brucks and W.E. Rogers H.E.I.C. Marine. 1825. Engraved by Bateman and Son’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:350 x 273 mm, on sheet 500 x 346 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Published by James Horsburgh, Hydrographer to the East India Company.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by soundings.Nautical chart of the western shores of the Persian Gulf compiled from the surveys carried out by the Bombay Marine’s officers between 1820 and 1829, showing the coast around Katiff [Al Qatif] with Ras Tannora [Ras Tanura] and Island of Tirhoot [Tarut Island].Includes note on Ras Tannora with remarks on the anchorage and coordinates.
